resources.string:
2020.04.24:
 · Fix: Optimize live map loading to avoid unneeded server requests
 · New: Added button "Add current location" to create standard waypoint
 · New: Added option to hide archived caches
 · New: Added map options to hide certain waypoint types
 · New: Show (unsaved) caches at corrected coordinates on live map if applicable
 · New: Create individual routes (by long pressing on icons in map)
 · New: Added option to disable transparent background
 · Fix: Crash after "Remove all" in cache list
 · Fix: Crash after rapid movements on OSM map
 · Fix: Store manually set values in seekbar preferences
 · Change: Moved hide options to separate map submenu
 · Change: Separated impacts from "hide disabled" and "hide archived" options
 · Change: Switch off indoor mode for Google Maps in satellite mode
 · Change: Improve visibility of subheadings in preferences
